project_plan.n: Basic Data Analysis on CSV Files
project_plan.descripton: Implement a Python program that performs basic data analysis on a CSV file by calculating and displaying the mean, median, and mode for numerical columns specified by the user.

task.n: Create a function to read a CSV file and load data into a DataFrame
Implement a function to calculate the mean of specified columns
Implement a function to calculate the median of specified columns
Implement a function to calculate the mode of specified columns
Implement a user interface to input the CSV file path and select columns for analysis
Write tests for each of the functions above
Execute tests on all implemented functions to ensure they function correctly
